# Java 开源项目中文文档 20160514

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/java-kaiyuan-xiangmu-zhongwen-wendang-20160514
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/java-kaiyuan-xiangmu-zhongwen-wendang-20160514
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install java-kaiyuan-xiangmu-zhongwen-wendang-20160514
java-kaiyuan-xiangmu-zhongwen-wendang-20160514 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g java-kaiyuan-xiangmu-zhongwen-wendang-erlingyiliulingwuyisi
java-kaiyuan-xiangmu-zhongwen-wendang-erlingyiliulingwuyisi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
